welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bourne, a charming town known for its beautiful beaches, quaint shops, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in all that Bourne has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barnstable Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Plymouth Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Plymouth Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Bedford Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Bedford Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Martha's Vineyard Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Martha's Vineyard Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Memorial Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Provincetown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
